name: 이순신
summary: Yi Sun-shin, also spelled Yi Sun-sin, was a Korean admiral and national hero whose naval victories were instrumental in repelling Japanese invasions of Korea in the 1590s.

events.event_description: Yi Sun-shin played a significant role in repelling Japanese invasions of Korea during the Imjin War.
Yi Sun-shin achieved a decisive victory against the Japanese navy in the Battle of Myeongnyang.
